name: I can destroy everything!!!
description:
Step into the joyful and relaxing world of gaming!

A casual game designed to help you unwind and destress!

Diverse maps to challenge your high score limits!

Explore various maps and push yourself to achieve your highest scores!

Destroy everything and experience more thrilling upgrades!

Simply destroy fun objects to earn points and use them to enhance your character's attributes, such as movement speed and power!

Unleash destruction in various scenes!

Hospitals, dessert shops, trees, witch houses, various animals, flowers, streetlights, hot air balloons... Everything is ready for your destruction in the game! Release your stress, feel the laughter, and embrace the challenge!
